entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
